phrases.translation: Habré terminado el libro para el viernes
phrases.answer: I will have finished the book by Friday
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating a completed action by a specified time in the future

phrases.translation: Ellos ya habrán llegado
phrases.answer: They will have arrived by now
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action by the present moment

phrases.translation: Habrá dejado de llover para el mediodía
phrases.answer: It will have stopped raining by noon
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action by a specific future time

phrases.translation: Habré visitado Machu Pichu para cuando tenga 25
phrases.answer: I will have visited Machu Picchu before I turn 25
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action before a specified future time

phrases.translation: Se habrán mudado para 2025
phrases.answer: They will have moved by 2025
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action by a specified future year

phrases.translation: El abuelo se habrá retirado para ese entonces
phrases.answer: Granddad will have retired by then
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action by a specified future time

phrases.translation: Para mayo, nos habremos conocido durante tres años
phrases.answer: By May, we will have known each other for three years
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action by a specified future month

phrases.translation: Él se habrá ido para cuando lleguemos
phrases.answer: He will have left by the time we arrive
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action by a specified future event

phrases.translation: Para fin de año, habremos estado juntos durante dos años
phrases.answer: By the end of the year, we will have been together for two years
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action by a specific future time

phrases.translation: El avión ya habrá despegado
phrases.answer: The plane will have already taken off
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action before a future reference point

phrases.translation: Ella habrá planeado todo antes del viaje
phrases.answer: She will have planned everything before the trip
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action by a specified future event

phrases.translation: El profesor habrá enseñado todos los contenidos para el viernes
phrases.answer: The teacher will have taught all the contents by Friday
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action by a specific future time

phrases.translation: Los efectos del cambio climático se habrán agravado a finales de esta década
phrases.answer: The effects of climate change will have worsened by the end of this decade
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action by a specified future time

phrases.translation: A finales de siglo se habrán alcanzado temperaturas récord
phrases.answer: By the end of the century, record temperatures will have been reached
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action by a specified future time

phrases.translation: Los científicos habrán descubierto una cura para la enfermedad para 2030
phrases.answer: Scientists will have discovered a cure for the disease by 2030
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action by a specific future year

phrases.translation: Fred habrá cumplido 18 años la próxima vez que lo veamos
phrases.answer: Fred will have turned 18 years old next time we see him
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action by a specific future event

phrases.translation: Habré entendido el tema para el final de este artículo
phrases.answer: I will have understood the topic by the end of this article
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action by a specific future event

phrases.translation: El reloj habrá dado la medianoche cuando lleguemos
phrases.answer: The clock will have struck midnight by the time we get there
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action by a specific future event

phrases.translation: Los estudiantes habrán rendido todos sus exámenes para el final del semestre
phrases.answer: The students will have sat for all their exams by the end of the semester
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action by a specific future time

phrases.translation: Habré escrito mi tarea antes de la fecha de entrega
phrases.answer: I will have written my assignment before the deadline
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action by a specific future event

phrases.translation: Sue se habrá ido de la fiesta para cuando lleguemos
phrases.answer: Sue will have left the party by the time we get there
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action by a specific future event

phrases.translation: Para fin de mes papá habrá estado trabajando para la empresa durante 10 años
phrases.answer: By the end of the month, Dad will have been working for the company for 10 years
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action by a specific future time

phrases.translation: El bebé habrá nacido para el 30 de septiembre
phrases.answer: The baby will have been born by 30 September
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action by a specific future date

phrases.translation: En dos años habré cambiado de trabajo
phrases.answer: In two year’s time, I will have changed jobs
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action by a specific future time

phrases.translation: Los alpinistas habrán llegado a la cima del monte Everest para el final del día
phrases.answer: The climbers will have reached the top of Mount Everest by the end of the day
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action by a specific future time

phrases.translation: Para finales de agosto, habremos estado viviendo en la misma casa durante cuatro años
phrases.answer: By the end of August, we will have been living in the same house for four years
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action by a specific future time

phrases.answer: The expedition will have run out of water before they get back

phrases.translation: La fiesta ya habrá comenzado
phrases.answer: The party will have already started

phrases.translation: La banda habrá tocado mi canción favorita para cuando lleguemos al concierto
phrases.answer: The band will have played my favorite song by the time we get to the concert

phrases.translation: Mi amigo se habrá ido a dormir para las 11 p. m
phrases.answer: My friend will have gone to bed by 11 p.m
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action by a specific future time

phrases.answer: I will have missed most of my English class by the time I arrive

phrases.translation: Para cuando se retire, Messi habrá marcado más goles que cualquier otro jugador
phrases.answer: By the time he retires, Messi will have scored more goals than any other player
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action by a specific future time

phrases.answer: By the end of the month, Andy will have been playing for the city orchestra for five years

phrases.translation: Habremos hecho todos los arreglos necesarios para el próximo fin de semana
phrases.answer: We will have made all the necessary arrangements by next weekend
phrases.why: Future perfect indicating an expected completion of action by a specific future time

phrases.translation: Los invitados no habrán llegado
phrases.answer: The guests will not have arrived
phrases.why: Negative future perfect indicating an expected non-completion of action by a specific future time

phrases.translation: El tren no habrá partido cuando lleguemos a la estación
phrases.answer: The train will not have departed by the time we get to the station
phrases.why: Negative future perfect indicating an expected non-completion of action by a specific future event

phrases.translation: No habrá dejado de llover para las 10 a. m
phrases.answer: It will not have stopped raining by 10 a.m
phrases.why: Negative future perfect indicating an expected non-completion of action by a specific future time

phrases.translation: La función no habrá terminado cuando lleguemos al teatro
phrases.answer: The performance will not have ended by the time we get to the theater
phrases.why: Negative future perfect indicating an expected non-completion of action by a specific future event

phrases.translation: La Tierra no se habrá enfriado para la próxima década
phrases.answer: The Earth will not have cooled down by next decade
phrases.why: Negative future perfect indicating an expected non-completion of action by a specific future time

phrases.translation: Para entonces no habrá oscurecido
phrases.answer: It will not have gotten dark by then
phrases.why: Negative future perfect indicating an expected non-completion of action by a specific future time

phrases.translation: No habré aprendido la lección antes de la próxima semana
phrases.answer: I will not have learned the lesson before next week
phrases.why: Negative future perfect indicating an expected non-completion of action by a specific future event

phrases.translation: No habrá olvidado la discusión antes de que la volvamos a ver
phrases.answer: She will not have forgotten the argument before we see her again
phrases.why: Negative future perfect indicating an expected non-completion of action by a specific future event

phrases.translation: Los niños no habrán escrito el ensayo para el jueves
phrases.answer: The boys won’t have written the essay by Thursday
phrases.why: Negative future perfect indicating an expected non-completion of action by a specific future time

phrases.translation: La policía no habrá resuelto el crimen
phrases.answer: The police will not have solved the crime
phrases.why: Negative future perfect indicating an expected non-completion of action by a specific future event

phrases.translation: No habré hecho toda mi tarea a la 1 p. m
phrases.answer: I will not have done all my homework by 1 p.m
phrases.why: Negative future perfect indicating an expected non-completion of action by a specific future time

phrases.translation: Sally todavía no se habrá ido de casa
phrases.answer: Sally won’t have left home already
phrases.why: Negative future perfect indicating an expected non-completion of action by a specific future event

phrases.translation: Supongo que no habrás escuchado las noticias
phrases.answer: I guess you won’t have heard the news

phrases.translation: El equipo no habrá completado el proyecto antes de la fecha límite
phrases.answer: The team won’t have completed the project before the deadline

phrases.translation: No habrás visto lo mejor de la serie hasta el último episodio

phrases.answer: I won’t have read the whole book before I have to give it back

phrases.translation: No habremos llegado para entonces

phrases.answer: The air conditioner will not have been fixed
